title: err="could not find block ..." many times
body:
Erigon version: 2022.10.01
OS: Ubuntu 22.04 LTS

Start command for erigon: `erigon --http --http.api=eth,erigon,web3,net,debug,trace,engine --http.addr 0.0.0.0 --snapshots=false --metrics --metrics.addr 0.0.0.0`

Start command for lighthouse: `lighthouse --network mainnet beacon --debug-level info --http-allow-sync-stalled --enr-udp-port=9000 --enr-tcp-port=9000 --discovery-port=9000 --reconstruct-historic-states --execution-jwt /home/share/erigon/jwt.hex --execution-endpoint http:/>`

I am running erigon node as an execution client with lighthouse as a consensus layer. Sometimes head block do not update for more then 10 mins. When I am checking logs I see next raws:

```
Oct 06 12:29:54 Ubuntu-2204-jammy-amd64-base erigon[2688467]: [INFO] [10-06|12:29:54.609] [5/16 Bodies] No block bodies to write in this log period block number=15688959 blk/second=0.000
Oct 06 12:30:04 Ubuntu-2204-jammy-amd64-base erigon[2688467]: [WARN] [10-06|12:30:04.129] Served                                   conn=34.118.99.175:18578 method=trace_block reqid=2 t=70.621µs err="could not find block 15688960"
Oct 06 12:30:04 Ubuntu-2204-jammy-amd64-base erigon[2688467]: [WARN] [10-06|12:30:04.131] Served                                   conn=34.118.99.175:17069 method=trace_block reqid=2 t=76.01µs err="could not find block 15689020"
```
